betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Now that you understand the nature and different forms of Warp it's time to look into ways to deal with it. Permanently.

Knowing the difficulty of truly destroying permanent Warp the Soul Brazier instead is a means of containing it. Supplied with a steady stream of Ignis centi-Vis and Mortuus Essentia it will store your permanent Warp, freeing you from its grasp.

Unfortunately this comes at a cost: Taint. While active a Soul Brazier will generate both Tainted Lands, and the Tendrils to spread it, within a 15 block radius. You will need to contain that as well, and make sure no non-energized nodes exist within the radius to become Tainted themselves.

Truthfully you're not sure if you can call this a permanent solution yet. If the seal never breaks, then yes, but there is no message or warning if it does. Just the natural conclusion of seeing, say, a Wither spawn right in your base. You'll need to study this in more detail...
